thread.title: Naanum Rowdy Dhaan censored
thread.title_full: Naanum Rowdy Dhaan censored - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Naanum Rowdy Dhaan censored
text:
While the teaser of Vijay Sethupathi's Naanum Rowdy Dhaan was released a few days ago, the film has now been censored with U/A certificate by the censor board. The film stars Vijay Sethupathi, Nayanthara in the lead with Parthiban, RJ Balaji and Naan Kadavul Rajendran in pivotal roles.
Directed by Vignesh Shivan, the film which has music by Anirudh has been produced by Dhanush under in Wunderbar Films. 'Naanum Rowdy Dhaan' is all set to hit the screens on 21st October along with Vikram's '10Endrathukkulla'. Interestingly, Nayanthara has finally dubbed in her own voice in the film film, in which she plays a hearing impaired character.
